pr_title: [ML] always write prediction_[score|probability] for classification inference

timeline.message:
[ML] always write prediction_[score|probability] for classification inference

In order to unify model inference and analytics results we
need to write the same fields.

prediction_probability and prediction_score are now written
for inference calls against classification models.

timeline.author: davidkyle

replies.bodyText: potentially, I am not sure if we want to backport it to 7.9 as java side inference was introduced in 7.9
replies.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: If it means the data in the destination index would have inconsistent fields without this fix in 7.9 when the fields were consistent in 7.8 then this is fixing a regression and should go into 7.9.
replies.author: droberts195

timeline.bodyText: Should LangIdentNeuralNetwork have the same logic?
timeline.author: davidkyle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -178,7 +178,7 @@ private InferenceResults buildResult(double[] value,
                     classificationProbability(value),
                     classificationLabels,
                     null,
-                    classificationConfig.getNumTopClasses(),
+                    classificationConfig.getNumTopClasses() == 0 ? 1 : classificationConfig.getNumTopClasses(),
